item.title: It Is Already May
item.description: It’s already May Woah, we have already surpassed the four-month mark for this year. A lot of things have happened in the last four months. In January, I was reassigned to my new team. Now, I’m working on our products’ Share and Review functionality. I’m back to Web Development + plus a little bit of UXP (proprietary Tech) that enables us to target our Desktop Apps with the same JS/TS code base Spent 40 days in Germany from March through Easter in April.
